channel.title: Work on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Work on My blog

item.title: Another day another award…
item.description: For 3 years in a row I’ve been working on Telstra NYE Mobile APP (via Imagination) and this time we won Awards. Obviously credits goes to whole team – but I’m glad the we make it this time.

item.title: GE Ecomagination Centre
item.description: GE Ecomagination Centre is the 840 square-metre space in Masdar City’s Incubator Building, showcases GE’s advanced technologies from cleaner solutions for power grids to upmarket appliances. I was heavily involved with building and designing some cool elements of this centre.

item.title: Talk: from light bulb to Arduino
item.description: I had opportunity to give a talk small talk about my work with Arduino on Commerce Factory – Nov 2014. Slides are available here: www.slideshare.net You can check video here

item.title: Interface Colour Play website
item.description: Very nice website for Interface – utility for clients to match tiles based on inspirational images. Build while working in Imagination for Interface.

item.title: Facebook APP – photo competition for AMEX
item.description:
Amex Picture This – Facebook application build for American Express while working for Imagination.

Users could enter their propositions for AMEX Picture This competition – second phase – voting system.

item.title: Web Acronyms
item.description: Short presentation which I gave couple years ago while working at Imagination Slide available here: Web Acronyms

item.title: Microsite for contact centre technology platform
item.description: Website build for one of the biggest technology platform for contact centre.

item.title: Centenary Quest – Facebook APP
item.description: Facebook APP (competition) build in Imagination for CBA.

item.title: Facebook competition
item.description: Application of competition on facebook. The system allows to cast their votes in the contest.

item.title: Data import to vTiger CRM
item.description: Import 4 million records to the CRM system. The project involved the migration of the existing CRM system dedicated to the popular solution called vTiger CRM. The database contains over 4 million transaction, the 200 thousand customer records and information related to service its customer base.
